### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#15870](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15870.html) (wallet: Only fail rescan when blocks have a

So, IIUC, `syncwithvalidationinterfacequeue` (`sync_all` -> `sync_mempools`) is necessary to ensure that the wallet processed everything before calling `listtransactions` in L77.

BTW restarted Appveyor.
